articles.title: Hong Kong renters' market as prices drop on expat moves - The Star Online
articles.description: An exodus of expatriates following anti-government protests, combined with a declining population and higher unemployment rate have led to sluggish rental demand in the Asian financial hub, even as purchase prices hold steady.
